overview: As the founder of Gogiro, I am currently working on scaling our capability within the business, and introducing some disruptive technologies and marketing strategies. I’ve been an entrepreneur most of my life, and have skill sets that cover a lot of ground. I can develop resources, structure organizations, lead management, and advance market position. I’ve helped a lot of small businesses grow, and built-up several companies internationally as a key executive leader. My approach is to be very creative, strategic, intelligent, and aggressive. I’m very hands-on with in-depth experience in small business, technology, scientific R&D, energy, and aerospace.
